data.name: Apocalyptic cars for Escape from police
data.detailed_description:
You are rebellious macho who are ready to fight with the current government. You are unruly and do not want to blindly obey. You are leader and ready to take the power in your hands.
Your plan is short and easy: destroy police, as they are your main obstacle on your way to victory, and make a coup. The luck was on your side and you easily found all elements which are necessary for creating a very special car, big heavy car with a big gun. And now you are ready to start your own apocalypse.

The main goals:
- run away from police
- survive as long as possible
- collect as much money as you can
- kill as many police cars as you can

Sounds too easy? But make no mistake, in reality it is much more difficult:

- Police cars are hunting you, so you should be very careful and react really fast.
- Police cars are not your only problem, sometimes comes the police helicopter and this machine is much faster and maneuvered then a car.
- And even this is not all, a lot of different obstacles will appear on your way.
- More time you are playing, more obstacles will appear.

Only a real professional may become a leader!

Controls are simple and will not distract your attention. Constant acceleration, two button controls ( turn left and right) and fast restart.

Key features of Apocalyptic cars for Escape from police:
very easy controls
10 randomly selected terrains
nice and simple design
10 3D fast cars (you can buy them on money collected during a gameplay)
police sedans, police SWAT vans, police coupes, police pick up trucks and helicopters
multi language support
funny gameplay

Controls:
- Arrow up - turbo speed
- Arrow down - breaking
- Arrow right - turn to the right
- Arrow left - turn to the left
- Space - shoot

So, start to play, choose your favorite car and go ahead, show your driving skills, make quick, unexpected turns and remember, one hit and you are dead!

The content of this DLC will be available from the game main menu.

data.short_description: Apocalyptic cars for Escape from police is a simple car driving simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
